articles.title: Man set to be put to death in Indiana's first execution in 15 years - NPR
articles.description: Barring intervention by Gov. Eric Holcomb, Corcoran is scheduled to be executed before sunrise Wednesday at the Indiana State Prison in Michigan City.
articles.content: MICHIGAN CITY, Ind. An Indiana man convicted in the 1997 killings of his brother and three other men was set to receive a lethal injection by early Wednesday in the state's first execution in 15 year… [+5923 chars]
